group_1.narration: "It's the third century CE…@We are in Japan under the reign@of Queen Himiko of Yamatai."
"Himiko resolved a violent conflict@known as the Civil War of Wa@by forming a type of coalition government@with all the regions under a queendom.@She took post as the country's leader."
"But there is also a region@that is not part of the coalition…@The land of Kuna."
"Yamatai was able to take control@by deriving power from the Wei Dynasty…@That is, a powerful continental force.@Kuna refused to become the Wei's vassal,@and thus were at odds with Yamatai."

group_1.textRight: …Considering this background,
I want to gather all the clues we can about Toyo,@who was a key figure of this era.

group_1.textLeft: You can't expect me to understand all that@at a time like this!
Whatever, I'll get you back from him,@so just sit tight!

group_1.textRight: Well, it's not as though I can move on my own@to begin with…
Boss, are we really gonna try capturing@her again after she whipped us good?

group_1.textLeft: Course not… Why else do you think we stole@this "book" thing of hers?

group_1.textRight: Lady Toyo! This book seems to be@an important gift from the Wei.
Having this stolen from you is sure@to cause many problems...
Do as we say, and we'll return the book.

group_1.textLeft: I already told you!@I'M NOT TOYO!
Just who the hell is Toyo anyway?!

group_1.textRight: That's me… I'm Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: What a surprise…@So that's Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: …Wait…SHE'S the girl who's so important?@THAT Toyo?

group_1.textRight: Correct…

group_1.narration: "She is the young queen who,@during the third century CE,@unified the country amid the chaos@that unfolded after Queen Himiko's death…@Her true successor."

group_1.textRight: …That's her.

group_1.textLeft: That girl is Toyo the successor…?

group_1.textRight: Boss, that little girl over there is the real Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed… I can see the resemblance…
But…this book is clearly far beyond@our technology…
It's gotta be a gift from the Wei… Only Lady Toyo@would be allowed to have this kind of thing.

group_1.textRight: Maybe that girl found it somewhere?

group_1.textLeft: No, you fool! If she has it, then of course@she must be Lady Toyo herself!
What…? You guys seriously think I'm Toyo?

group_1.textRight: So it seems…@This book containing Big Sister's records…
It appears they believe it was a gift@from the Wei.
Presumably, they interpret it as some kind@of dynastic seal…a token of vassalage.
So which one's the real Toyo?
The one who looks like the queen?@Or the one with the book?

group_1.textLeft: Aw, what's it matter?! Let's just grab 'em both@and take 'em back to Kuna!

group_1.textRight: Right. Don't make this harder than it needs@to be…Lady Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: …I don't understand what's happening, but…
I've heard in passing that the Kuna are the guys@standing against Himiko.
So you gotta be planning on kidnapping the@suck-sessor candidate for political stuff, right?
There's no way I'm going to a place like that!
And I'm not going there either.

group_1.textRight: Tsk… What do we do about this book?

group_1.textLeft: I thought I heard your voice, Rena…

group_1.textRight: Looks like we were right to come here!

group_1.textLeft: Momoko! Kaede!
You little…!@Not you damned attendants again!
Can you stand?

group_1.textRight: [chara:790401:effect_shake]Sorry, boss, no can do…

group_1.textLeft: This power that can best us so effortlessly…@It seems those wild rumors were true after all.
Yamatai has granted the power of curses@to their shrine maidens…

group_1.textRight: …Let's retreat for now. So long as we have@this item on hand, it's good enough.

group_1.textLeft: I agree.

group_1.textRight: …They're retreating? What a predicament.@Listen carefully to what I'm about to say.

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?

group_1.textRight: Toyo will become a Magical Girl.
You must accompany Toyo through this era,
which will ensure the full retrieval@of Big Sister's concept.

group_1.textLeft: Toyo…will become a Magical Girl?
HAH!

group_1.textRight: Eep…! A smoke bomb?

group_1.textLeft: They're getting away!
H-hang on!@Nemu!

group_1.textRight: Ah…@Looks like they escaped.

group_1.textLeft: Sure does…

group_1.textRight: Who's this, Rena?

group_1.textLeft: This is Toyo. She's the key figure@of our collection mission.

group_1.textRight: She's…

group_1.textLeft: What are you guys…looking at me@like that for…?

group_1.textCenter: (But no matter what, we can't stop her…)

group_1.narration: Even if we tried…@There's no preventing this.
